item.title: Nosferatu Continues A Robert Eggers Rotten Tomatoes Trend And Perfectly Explains Why It Keeps Happening
item.description: Robert Eggers' Rotten Tomatoes audience scores are typically much lower than his critic scores, and Nosferatu perfectly demonstrates why.

item.title: 10 Movies That Are Time Capsules From The 1990s
item.description: Movies are a great way to understand what life was like during that year, and many 1990s films serve as the ultimate time capsule of the decade.

item.title: The 10 Worst Crimes Committed By Star Wars Heroes
item.description: Star Wars is filled with the most iconic heroes in sci-fi, but in a galaxy at war, even the best characters can commit the worst crimes.
